name: Squares-lgj
description:
Squares is a quick game made for the List Game Jam 2018

Inpired by and old homebrew PSP game made by Globware, Squarez http://www.globware.com/psphomebrew_squarez.php

Collect Green squares and avoid the red ones.

Online demo at: https://orbaruk.github.io/

Source code availble at: https://github.com/OrBaruk/squares-lgj
